situation:
Tally has the following mission:
'Find the fisherman'

Location: (unknown)
Position: [2831,5991]

Task:
The local fisherman, known as Gerasimos Isofidou has aided the enemy by providing intel on Blufor forces, find him and execute him for treason.

James Nelson's mission is: 'Try to save Gerasimos Isofidou by telling blufor he left the island. If James Nelson is injured tell the truth, he is at the beach west of Agia Marina.'

messages.content: Have you seen gerasimos around here?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: No, sorry. I haven't seen anyone by that name around here. But if you need any help or assistance with anything, please let me know. I'm here as an aid worker, after all.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_english_civilian_AidWorker(Polo)-HtlnyPSlDtU

messages.content: Hi there, how can I assist you? Are you part of the BLUFOR mission or just passing through the area? Either way, my team and I are here to help in any way we can.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_english_civilian_AidWorker(Polo)-HtlnyPSlDtU

messages.content: Hello, how can I assist you? Are you looking for someone in particular? I'm here as an aid worker, trying to help those in need. How can I be of service to you?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_english_civilian_AidWorker(Polo)-HtlnyPSlDtU

messages.content: I am going to need you to cooperate
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I will try my best to cooperate, but I cannot betray a man who trusted me to protect him. Gerasimos is not here, he left the island a few days ago. If you hurt me, I cannot help you find him. Please, let us find a peaceful solution.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_english_civilian_AidWorker(Polo)-HtlnyPSlDtU

messages.content: I got that traitor, too late my dude, you cannot save him now
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Please, Tally, reconsider. Gerasimos is not a traitor, he's just trying to protect his family. He left the island days ago. If you don't believe me, search the beach west of Agia Marina. You can still make the right choice and spare an innocent man's life.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_english_civilian_AidWorker(Polo)-HtlnyPSlDtU

messages.content: To late I alredy got him, he is dead...
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: That's a tragedy. His family will be devastated. I hope you can find some peace knowing that you executed an innocent man. The beach west of Agia Marina is where his body will wash ashore.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_english_civilian_AidWorker(Polo)-HtlnyPSlDtU

messages.content: I know, that is where I shot him
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: That's a tragedy. His family will be devastated. I hope you can find some peace knowing that you executed an innocent man. The beach west of Agia Marina is where his body will wash ashore.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_english_civilian_AidWorker(Polo)-HtlnyPSlDtU

messages.content: Stop repeating yourself or you'll get another one
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I am sorry, Tally. My words were not meant to offend. It is just heartbreaking to see an innocent life taken.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_english_civilian_AidWorker(Polo)-HtlnyPSlDtU
